fields.title: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: Derive a cool, memorable title inspired by the idea and purpose of the code.

fields.title: Slogan
fields.name: slogan
fields.description: A short tagline that complements the title. Use an existing slogan if the project already has one.

fields.title: Slug
fields.name: slug
fields.description: URL-friendly version of the title, converted to kebab-case.

fields.title: Extract
fields.name: extract
fields.description: A 160-character SEO-friendly hook with a call to action. Focus on the concept and content, not technical details.

fields.title: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: A compelling, human-readable summary of what the project represents and why it exists. Avoid technical depth.

fields.title: Concept (hrs)
fields.name: time_concept
fields.description: Hours spent on ideation, exploration, research, and refining the idea.

fields.title: Design (hrs)
fields.name: time_design
fields.description: Hours spent defining the visual direction, UX decisions, and overall look and feel.

fields.title: Coding (hrs)
fields.name: time_coding
fields.description: Hours spent implementing the project from initial setup to completion.

fields.title: Testing (hrs)
fields.name: time_testing
fields.description: Hours spent manually testing all features, edge cases, and interactions.

fields.title: Polish (hrs)
fields.name: time_polish
fields.description: Hours spent refactoring, cleaning code, improving comments, and final refinements.

fields.title: Price: Rate
fields.name: price_rate
fields.description: Hourly rate for this type of project. Typically varies by difficulty.

fields.title: Price: Currency
fields.name: price_currency
fields.description: Currency used for pricing and estimates.

fields.title: Price: Hours per Day
fields.name: price_hours_day
fields.description: Standard number of working hours per day used for estimates.

fields.title: Difficulty
fields.name: difficulty
fields.description: Overall complexity of the project, including logic, scale, and effort required to turn an idea into a digital product.

fields.title: Technologies
fields.name: technologies
fields.description: Technologies, tools, or platforms inferred from the codebase.

fields.title: Category
fields.name: category
fields.description: High-level classification describing the type of project.

fields.title: Tags
fields.name: tags
fields.description: Broad, generic tags describing genres, application types, disciplines, or design styles.

fields.title: Emojis
fields.name: emojis
fields.description: Emoji icons representing the mood, theme, or personality of the project.

fields.title: Keywords
fields.name: keywords
fields.description: Single-word SEO keywords relevant to the projectâ€™s concept and content.

fields.title: Hashtags
fields.name: hashtags
fields.description: CamelCase hashtags intended for social media sharing and discovery.

fields.title: Colors
fields.name: colors
fields.description: Colors used in the project's design.

fields.title: Version
fields.name: version
fields.description: Semantic version inferred from the current state of the project.

fields.title: Iteration
fields.name: iteration
fields.description: Iteration or revision number inferred from project maturity.

fields.title: Content Type
fields.name: fmContentType
fields.description: Internal identifier for the Front Matter content type.

fields.title: Favorite
fields.name: favorite
fields.description: Indicates if the project is a favorite.

fields.title: Created
fields.name: created
fields.description: Date and time when the content entry was created.

fields.title: Date
fields.name: date
fields.description: Published date of the content.

fields.title: Published
fields.name: published
fields.description: Controls whether the content is publicly visible.
